  • Reference

Set the SODAR configuration.

sodar_config.Rd

This function sets the SODAR configuration.

Usage

sodar_config(sodar_api_token, sodar_url, set_options = TRUE)

Arguments

sodar_api_token

A character string containing the SODAR API token.

sodar_url

A character string containing the SODAR URL.

set_options

A logical value indicating whether to set the global options.

Value

An invisible list containing the SODAR configuration.
